name: Jayne Cobb Hat Firefly Series Serenity Multi Color Ear Flap Hat
description:
Are there any Firefly fans out there? I loved the short run series Firefly and wish so much that another network would pick it up, so that I can get at least closure with the series...ya know what I mean. They tried with Serenity, but I need MORE!! lol

My favorite character besides Capt. Mal is Jayne....so serious, but really a teddy bear.

My friend got me hooked on the series and so in thanks I made him a Jayne earflap hat.

Anyone going to a Browncoats convention this year?

I make these hats for cosplay, conventions or just in support of a great television series. Can make it any size, just email me.

It is made of soft cotton blends yarn and all details are handsewn on. You may handwash it and lay flat to dry. I make my items to last for years to come. All my creations are created in a clean air environment. Thank you for stopping by Fashion Diva Crochet. Please make my shop a Favorite, as I am adding new and unique items all the time. SHIPPING PRICES ARE FOR THE US ONLY. IF YOU ARE OUT OF US, PLEASE EMAIL FOR AN EXACT SHIPPING QUOTE...THANK YOU!

Please come join my blog at Fashion Diva Crochet Blog where I will be showcasing the new crocheted items that I will be putting in my shops, as well as giving crochet tutorials and also I will be sharing my love for nail art and my designs and others designs and last but not least, I am on a weight loss journey goal that I will be sharing through eating low carb....won't you please come and be a part....
